mapper.insert: INSERT INTO birthday_coupon ( coupon_code, coupon_name, discount_amount, valid_from, valid_to, user_id, used, created_at ) VALUES ( #{couponCode}, #{couponName}, #{discountAmount}, #{validFrom}, #{validTo}, #{userId}, #{used}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT coupon_id, coupon_code, coupon_name, discount_amount, valid_from, valid_to, user_id, used, created_at FROM birthday_coupon WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND valid_to >= CURRENT_DATE AND used = 0 ORDER BY valid_to ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT coupon_id, coupon_code, coupon_name, discount_amount, valid_from, valid_to, user_id, used, created_at FROM birthday_coupon WHERE coupon_code = #{couponCode} AND valid_to >= CURRENT_DATE AND used = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE birthday_coupon SET used = 1 WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId}
